HomePage.title: Welcome to BioSystems Indonesia
HomePage.description: The best platform for biosystem management

Home.h1-slide-2: Reliable outcomes begin with robust systems

Solutions.content: Since 1981, we have focused on developing analytical solutions for in vitro diagnostics (IVD) throughout the entire value chain. We provide laboratory technicians with robust systems that ensure reliable results for informed decision-making.

item1.title: 24h Customer Support
item1.desc: Support via phone or WhatsApp—so you can rely on us whenever you need assistance.

item2.title: Trusted Quality & Stability
item2.desc: Produced under one fully integrated facility, our reagents and instruments guarantee excellent quality and stability.

item3.title: Reliable Supply
item3.desc: With up to 6 months of buffer stock, we help your lab run without interruptions.

item4.title: After-Sales Without Worries
item4.desc: From installation, training, calibration, to maintenance and spare part replacement—our services are provided free of charge.

item5.title: Free Shipping Nationwide
item5.desc: We provide complimentary shipping for all non-e-catalog orders nationwide.
